Title: Planet Earth
Actors: David Attenborough, Sigourney Weaver, Thomas Anguti Johnston
Plot: Each 50 minute episode features a global overview of a different biome or habitat on Earth (Polar, Mountain, Cave, Desert, Plains, Fresh Water, Seas, Ocean, Forest), followed by a ten-minute featurette which takes a behind-the-scenes look at the challenges of filming the episode.
Awards: Won 4 Primetime Emmys. Another 11 wins & 15 nominations.
